entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
